description: The Italian Stallion is the perfect drink to enjoy with your favorite veggie pizza. It has the perfect balance between sweet and savory, so you won't miss out on any flavor! Plus this invigorating blend tastes just like&nbsp;summer in a cup—which means it's going go great with all sorts of all vegetarian pizzas.
